name: star_aligner
title: STAR Aligner
summary: Maps FASTQ reads (paired or unpaired) to a reference transcriptome/genome with the STAR software

inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: A plain or gzipped FASTQ file, with the reads to be mapped (or the left reads, for paired pairs).
inputSpec.name: reads_fastqgz

inputSpec.help: (Optional) A plain or gzipped FASTQ file, with the right reads to be mapped (for paired reads).
inputSpec.label: Reads (right mates)
inputSpec.name: reads2_fastqgz

inputSpec.help: A tar archive with the reference genome/transcriptome already indexed with STAR. See the STAR Genome/Transcriptome Indexer app for more.
inputSpec.label: STAR genome/transcriptome index
inputSpec.name: genomeindex_tar

inputSpec.help: (Optional) A string, without spaces, that will be used to name the output BAM file. If not provided, the output file will be named after the input reads file.
inputSpec.label: Sample name
inputSpec.name: sample_name

inputSpec.help: (Optional) Select 'RemoveNoncanonical' to filter out alignments that contain non-canonical junctions. Select 'RemoveNoncanonicalUnannotated' to filter out alignments that contain non-canonical unannotated junctions when using annotated splice junctions (the annotated non-canonical junctions will be kept). This will supply the '--outFilterIntronMotifs' option to STAR. If not given, STAR does not perform any filtering.
inputSpec.label: Filter out alignments with non-canonical junctions
inputSpec.name: out_filter_intron_motifs

inputSpec.help: Extra command line options that will be supplied directly to the STAR execution. WARNING: if provided, these extra options will be used in addition to any common options. Example: --outFilterMismatchNmax 5
inputSpec.label: Extra command line options
inputSpec.name: extra_options

outputSpec.label: Sorted mappings
outputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the resulting mappings.
outputSpec.name: sorted_bam

outputSpec.label: Splice junctions
outputSpec.help: A tab-delimited text file with high-confidence collapsed splice junctions.
outputSpec.name: sj_tsv

outputSpec.label: Unmapped reads
outputSpec.help: Fastx files containing the unmapped reads.
outputSpec.name: unmapped_fastx
